DOC.brief_summary: To examine association various dietary element risk coronary heart disease stroke .
DOC.detailed_description: BACKGROUND : Cardiovascular disease lead cause death among resident United States . The effect dietary cholesterol fat risk coronary heart disease ( CHD ) stroke examine extensively epidemiologic study . However , result study inconsistent . Furthermore , association key element diet risk CHD stroke insufficiently study epidemiologic study . DESIGN NARRATIVE : The study examine prospectively association : 1 ) dietary intake trans-unsaturated fat risk coronary heart disease 2 ) dietary intake total , saturate unsaturated fat risk stroke ; 3 ) dietary intake vegetable animal protein risk stroke ; 4 ) dietary intake total water-soluble fiber risk coronary heart disease stroke ; 5 ) dietary intake sodium potassium risk coronary heart disease stroke ; 6 ) dietary intake vitamin C , carotenoid , vitamin E , folic acid risk coronary heart disease stroke ; 7 ) specific food , fish , bean , fruit , vegetable risk coronary heart disease stroke . In addition , association baseline serum vitamin A , vitamin C , folate risk coronary heart disease stroke investigate . Data NHANES1 Epidemiologic Follow-Up Study ( NHEFS ) use test hypothesis . The NHEFS on-going prospective cohort study conduct 14,407 United States men woman age 25 74 year National Center Health Statistics ( NCHS ) . The baseline data , include 24-hour dietary recall food frequency questionnaire , well important cardiovascular risk factor collect 1971-75 . The follow-up data collect 1982 1984 , 1986 , 1987 , 1992 . The follow-up data obtain mean interview , medical record health care facility , death certificate decedent . In study , investigator re-code dietary data calculate dietary nutrient use ESHA Nutrient Database . They also analyze relationship dietary nutrient specific food risk CHD stroke . The study completion date list record obtain `` End Date '' enter Protocol Registration Results System ( PRS ) record .
